name: Kittens Lost in Space
description:
After crash-landing on an alien planet two cute kittens fight to stay alive. In the meantime, a third player leads the planet against the invading kittens. The planet has a multitude of weapons at its disposal including trees and volcanos.

To play the game it is recommended that two Xbox-controllers is used and a mouse. The controllers will control the Kittens and the mouse controls the Planet.

Made by: Boarding Experts.
